intro: Psychotria dura, commonly known as the hard psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Psychotria dura is also known for its alkaloid content, which has been studied for potential medicinal properties.
